patthana16.1:2.1_0: Kusalaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ
patthana16.1:2.1_1: hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ hetuṁ
patthana16.1:2.1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ
patthana16.1:2.1_3: paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ca naabyākato nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ
patthana16.1:2.1_4: hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naakusalo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:3.1_0: Akusalaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ
patthana16.1:3.1_1: hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ hetuṁ
patthana16.1:3.1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ
patthana16.1:3.1_3: paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naabyākato nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ
patthana16.1:3.1_4: hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naakusalo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:4.1_0: Abyākataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ
patthana16.1:4.1_1: hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ hetuṁ
patthana16.1:4.1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naakusalo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.1:5.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.1:6.1: Kusalaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.1:7.1: Naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā terasa …pe… napurejāte terasa …pe… navippayutte nava …pe… novigate nava.
patthana16.1:9.1_0: Kusalo hetu dhammo nakusalassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo
patthana16.1:9.1_1: hetu dhammo naakusalassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo hetu dhammo
patthana16.1:9.1_2: naabyākatassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo hetu dhammo naakusalassa
patthana16.1:9.1_3: nahetussa ca naabyākatassa nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo hetu
patthana16.1:9.1_4: dhammo nakusalassa nahetussa ca naakusalassa nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.1:10.1: Akusalo hetu dhammo naakusalassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … pañca.
patthana16.1:11.1: Abyākato hetu dhammo nakusalassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana16.1:12.1: Kusalo hetu dhammo nakusalassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.1:13.1_0: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa, anantare samanantare sahajāte
patthana16.1:13.1_1: terasa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, pacchājāte āsevane
patthana16.1:13.1_2: nava, vipāke tīṇi, indriye magge aṭṭha, sampayutte vippayutte nava …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.1:14.1: Kusalaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.1:15.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
